page.title: 15LIFE FOR A TEENAGER D.ABBOTS
page.content: One young person from the village was interviewed.She had not been born in the area but moved in at the age of 8. She travels to Kingshill school by bus.There isn't a great deal to do in the evenings so she meets friends in Cirencester,relying on parents for the 12-mile round trip.At weekends she goes to South Cerney watersports area where she enjoys windsurfing.Most of her friends live outside the village and often she stays overnight with them.The village is too quiet for her and once old enough she will leave to live in a town in the Midlands .The only hobby she enjoys at home is listening to pop music.
